name: Cran-Lemon Cookies
description: Squeeze the day! These tangy cookies are packed with the vibrant tartness and sweetness of real lemon, without the hassle of pulling out a citrus press. Studded with luscious red cranberry pieces and optional chocolate chips, these gluten-free treats will be the star of any cookie platter.
preparation: Preheat oven to 375° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
In large bowl, combine mix, eggs, oil, and yogurt. Stir in chocolate chips, if using. Scoop batter into balls, roughly 2 tbsp each. Place on pan 1" apart.
Bake 10 min or until edges start to brown slightly. Let cool on pan for 10 min and transfer to Cooling Rack.
tips: If you have some leftover cookies, store them in layers with sheets of parchment paper in between the layers to prevent sticking.
